words.translation: one; once; first; structural word between two of the same verb; as soon as; throughout

sentences.sentence: A: 谢谢! B: 不客气
sentences.translation: A: Thank you! B: You're welcome

sentences.sentence: 别人谢谢我, 我说不客气
sentences.translation: When others thank me, I say 'you're welcome.'

sentences.sentence: 没关系, 我可以帮你
sentences.translation: No problem, I can help you
